snippet.title: Stock Car Extreme - MIT Lancer Cup at Velo Cittá
snippet.description:
The next upcoming addition to Stock Car Extreme is the officially licensed Mitsubishi Lancer Cup series, along with its official home - the Velo Cittá race track.

Featuring 2 specs of race prepared Lancer Evos (the more conventional R with 300 HP, and the fully race-prepped RS with 340 HP), the Lancer Cup is dedicated for customer drivers and it adapts a "sit & drive" model, in which all cars are prepared to be identical and no setup adjustments are allowed.

The Velo Cittá circuit is the main venue for the series - this brand new, charming track us located in Mogi Guaçu (100km from São Paulo), and is along with Interlagos and Curitiba, only the third FIA-homologated race track in Brazil

Both the Lancer R & Lancer RS are the first AWD cars in the simulator . The cars are notoriously stable, allowing the driver to focus on maximizing his lines and driving as fast as possible. 

Losing control with these cars is not easy, but as our test driver demonstrates towards the end of the video, in the right hands anything is possible :)
